kpi_info.title: Computer unit average load ratio
kpi_info.use: Average load rate of computer unit
kpi_info.use_experience:
This KPI shows the average load
PUBLISHED: M12
LAST UPDATE: 31-07-2009
THEORETICAL SUMMARY LEVELS: MSC;HLR;SRR,UNIT

NOTES: This NSN KPI is compliant with ex-S "MSC Processor Load" KPI.
